lead_paragraph: A little-known federal program that avoids publicity to protect from looters the thousands of Native American sites it's tasked with managing has been caught up in a big net.
snippet: A little-known federal program that avoids publicity to protect from looters the thousands of Native American sites it's tasked with managing has been caught up in a big net....

headline.main: Shielded Native American Sites Thrust Into Debate Over Dams
headline.print_headline: Shielded Native American Sites Thrust Into Debate Over Dams
